Some more about me

I have been engrossed in web design & development since the late-90s, starting in my early teenage years. It’s a passion and I love it.

My first website was a simple fan site for the movie Star Wars, released in ‘99. Since then I couldn’t stop building anything web related. I took on any project and didn’t focus on one skill.

In the years to follow I knew I wanted to make this my profesion. So I had to make a decision on what I liked doing most.

I really liked designing but more I liked coding the design into something workable. I am very passionate about this and eventually this passion turned into projects involving offline devices.

I start design my own printboards and start coding in C++. I also start learning to make 3D objects. However this remains a hobby.

My real focus went to front-end development. I love HTML5, JS, and CSS. I'm also not shy of using tools like Grunt.

Curriculum Vitae

2015

  1. Front-end developer Qaraqter B.V.

    January 2009 - August 2015

    In the past 5 years I created and maintained a HRM application and a iPad application with technologies such as manifest and localstorage. Next to this role I was also responsible for the development of corporate websites and the integration of it into an open-source CMS named MODx.

  2. Front-end developer Aerosol Webdesign

    June 2009 - Junuary 2009

    After making the decision to try something new, I went on the freelance course, I worked from my home with some really cool projects both on front-end development and design. However I quickly discovered that I didn't enjoy the commercial side of it.

  3. Front-end developer Enof

    July 2008 – June 2009

    Enof ontwerp + communicatie is a full service agency with a lot of creativity and high profile customers. I was responsible for the front-end development and for the integration of it into an open-source CMS (i.e. Joomla or Wordpress).

  4. Webdesigner Proximedia

    June 2006 – July 2008

    Proximedia was my first opportunity to work as a professional webdesigner. I was solely responsible for building a complete website in one day including the aftercare and support.
